title: NRE Capstone Design
description: NRE Capstone Design course - an open-minded design project, performed by students organized in design teams, that integrates all relevant nuclear and radiological engineering aspects.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: NRE 4350 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (NRE 4214 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or NRE 4328 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
